desc: Beautiful, tiered tray décor delivered to your door every month! I created this subscription box because of my love of decorating tiered trays and decorating in general. Other than being an excellent creative outlet, tiered trays are a great way to give your home a quick refresh without making a huge investment.

layout.text:
A monthly subscription box of tiered tray decor.
A great way to give your home a quick refresh without making a huge investment.
